name: Marshmallow Game
description:
• Grab marshmallow to roast by the fire.
  • Release to finish cooking. (yum!)
  • Get your 'crisp factor' as close to 100 as possible.
  • Scores closer to 0.0 are better.
    • Last Score in top left.
    • High Score in top right.
  • This is an early prototype! Currently in development for mobile devices.
